headline: NDSN Q4 Deep Dive: Semiconductor and Asia Demand Drive Growth, Guidance Raised
summary: Manufacturing company Nordson (NASDAQ:NDSN) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 8.8% year on year to $669.5 million. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was better than expected at $725 million at the midpoint, 1.8% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.37 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Nordson (NDSN) After Strong 1-Year Share Price Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Nordson is priced fairly at around US$299, this is a good moment to step back and look closely at what you are really paying for. The stock has recently posted returns of 1.6% over the last 7 days, 10.1% over 30 days, 24.2% year to date, and 39.5% over 1 year, which naturally raises questions about how much upside or risk might now be baked into the price. Recent coverage has focused on Nordson as a key player in capital goods and industrial equipment,...

headline: Nordson (NDSN) Q1 2026 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Before we begin, please refer to slide two of our presentation, where we note that certain statements regarding our future performance that are made during this call may be forward-looking based upon Nordson Corporation’s current expectations.  On slide number five, you'll see first quarter fiscal 2026 sales were a first quarter record of $669,000,000, up 9% from the prior year first quarter sales of $615,000,000.
